summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3869 for the improvement of 37th Avenue, from East Cherry Street to a point 90 feet north of East Spring Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47295, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
